summary: This document is a draft factual statement prepared for potential submission to Sarah Kellen Vicker's lawyers, intended for inclusion in a Presentence Report. It details her employment by Jeffrey Epstein from 2001-2013, her role in scheduling massage appointments that led to the sexual abuse of minors, her own victimization by Epstein, and her subsequent actions to obstruct the investigation.

persons.name: Sarah Kellen Vicker
persons.context: Former employee of Jeffrey Epstein from approximately 2001 to 2013, responsible for scheduling massage appointments. The document details her victimization by Epstein, her role in facilitating appointments for minor victims, and her later actions to obstruct the investigation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central figure in the case, described as sexually abusing his assistant Sarah Kellen Vicker and dozens of minor victims during massage appointments she scheduled. He directed her activities and the obstruction of the investigation.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned as having provided a directory of women and girls to Sarah Kellen Vicker for the purpose of scheduling massage appointments for Epstein.

persons.name: Maurene
persons.context: The sender of the email containing the draft factual statement, seeking review from 'Chiefs' on the phrasing.

connections.description: Epstein employed Vicker as a personal assistant from approximately 2001 to 2013.
Epstein sexually abused Vicker, including forcible rape, and controlled aspects of her life such as diet, clothing, and sleep.
At Epstein's direction, Vicker took nude photographs of minor victims and later contacted victims to discourage cooperation with law enforcement, offering financial incentives.
Maxwell provided Vicker with a directory of contacts to use for scheduling Epstein's massage appointments.
Maxwell was involved in the operation, providing a directory of contacts for Epstein's massage appointments to his assistant.

events.title: Sarah Kellen Vicker Employment Begins
events.description: Sarah Kellen Vicker begins employment as a personal assistant to Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Period of Massage Appointment Scheduling
events.description: Sarah Kellen Vicker schedules hundreds of massage appointments for Epstein, involving dozens of minor victims, during which Epstein sexually abused them.

events.title: Vicker Learns of Law Enforcement Investigation
events.description: Sarah Kellen Vicker learns that law enforcement is investigating Epstein for sex crimes involving minors related to the appointments she facilitated.

events.title: Federal Investigation Interviews Begin
events.description: Federal law enforcement officers begin interviewing minor victims as part of a criminal investigation into Epstein and his associates for sex trafficking of minors.

events.title: Expert Psychological Report Completed
events.description: An expert psychologist specializing in victims of sex trafficking completes a report regarding Sarah Kellen Vicker's experiences.

keyFacts: Sarah Kellen Vicker, employed by Jeffrey Epstein from ~2001-2013, was herself a victim of sexual abuse and control by Epstein.
Between approximately 2002 and 2005, Vicker scheduled hundreds of massage appointments for Epstein involving dozens of minor victims (ages 14-17), during which Epstein sexually abused them.
Vicker witnessed and participated in some abuse, including being present for a massage where Epstein touched a minor's genitals and taking nude photographs of minors at Epstein's direction.

After learning of the law enforcement investigation in ~2005, Vicker, at Epstein's direction, contacted minor victims to discourage cooperation with law enforcement and offered them financial incentives.
The document is a draft factual statement for a Presentence Report, indicating ongoing legal proceedings related to Vicker's role.
